title: Why can't I post on PBE boards?

replies.body: Your PBE boards account might have just needed a quick sync up. I poked it on our end, so do me a favor and try posting again. Let me know if you still can't!
Ditto for me Broporo, my PBE account name is dontkilldyl, could you please give me a helping hand? Thanks!
-poke poke- Give it the ol' college try now ^_^
IT WORKED!!! You have magic hands my friend, employee of the month in my book.
Me too cant post on PBE Boards and it says it must be LvL 1 and when i go to Boards Profile it gives me Error 404
I was able to find your PBE account and push a sync through, try posting over there now ^_^
Cant post too. "Buff Bruisers" pbe acc

Hi, could you have a look at my pbe account too? same name. I'm stuck at "login to comment" even though I am already logged in (using pbe credentials) and I already played some games on the pbe. Is there something I am missing?

If it's saying login to comment, it sounds like you might not be logged in with the correct region. I went ahead and gave your PBE account a quick poke, but please make sure you're using the right username for your PBE account.

well, it was the same as the op picture, you can see he is logged in on his pbe account on the pbe region, yet the login in to comment is there.

whatever you did worked, thanks.
Thank you Broporo I can post now! <3
